Stoppage time Jadson strike takes Shandong into Asian CL quartersBrazilian defender Jadson scored seven minutes into stoppage time to earn Shandong Taishan a 4-2 win over Kawasaki Frontale on Tuesday to take the Chinese side into the quarter-finals of the Asian Champions League with a 6-5 aggregate victory. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 12:48:34 GMT ARYQGMXWBRI4LFIW43GWNGNLNU https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/stoppage-time-jadson-strike-takes-shandong-into-asian-cl-quarters-2024-02-20/Michael Church运动的足球
China must see need to reform WTO rules, says EU trade chiefChina needs to play a constructive role in talks at the World Trade Organization to reform global trade rules on industrial subsidies or risk rivals setting their own policies at China's expense, the European Union's trade chief said on Monday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 12:02:23 GMT 257PCNQXGBBOBLJNSUWE7TCYXJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-must-see-need-reform-wto-rules-says-eu-trade-chief-2024-02-20/Philip Blenkinsop世界中国
Nvidia's surging growth may still disappoint some investorsNvidia is set to post a more than three-fold surge in its fourth-quarter revenue on Wednesday, the same as in the previous quarter, as demand for its chips that dominate the market for artificial intelligence outstrips supply. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 11:20:45 GMT ALXP2GGE6BKNFPAKDH6RRNRKJU https://www.reuters.com/technology/nvidias-surging-growth-may-still-disappoint-some-investors-2024-02-20/Arsheeya Bajwa技术
HEDGE FLOW Hedge funds double down on China ahead of rate cut, Goldman saysHedge funds favoured Asian emerging markets in the week to Feb. 15, piling into company stocks in China, Korea, Taiwan, and India, in moves that came just before China slashed its benchmark mortgage rate, Goldman Sachs research showed. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 11:08:02 GMT 2FHDL7OWZVJMRNQUXEVFGHWN3A https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/hedge-flow-hedge-funds-double-down-china-ahead-rate-cut-goldman-says-2024-02-20/Nell Mackenzie, Summer Zhen商业金融
Morning Bid: Rates angst, China cut and credit card dealA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Tue, 20 Feb 2024 11:06:30 GMT YJHV5AM4PJMXDAQAUE723UOQP4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-02-20/Reuters市场美国市场
Republican lawmakers urge Biden to deactivate campaign TikTok accountA group of 18 Republican lawmakers has urged President Joe Biden to deactivate his campaign's TikTok account citing national security concerns. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 10:04:03 GMT 356TOK6LMRJLVEALLFAJQTK65Q https://www.reuters.com/world/us/republican-lawmakers-urge-biden-deactivate-campaign-tiktok-account-2024-02-20/David Shepardson世界美国
Exclusive: Japan's Kyushu Electric to wait for US LNG policy clarity on Lake CharlesJapan's Kyushu Electric Power will wait until after the United States resumes issuing export licences for new liquefied natural gas (LNG) projects before deciding on whether to invest in the Lake Charles project, an executive said. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:31:00 GMT FMGIOO3Z2JKLFON7QSNB7ZURE4 https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/japans-kyushu-electric-wait-us-lng-policy-clarity-lake-charles-2024-02-20/Yuka Obayashi可持续发展气候与能源
Chinese tourists flock to Southeast Asia as overseas travel bounces backChinese travellers flocked to tourist hot-spots across Asia over the Lunar New Year break, with visitor numbers and spending in destinations including Singapore, Thailand and Malaysia exceeding pre-COVID levels. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 07:11:31 GMT CSFIQ2TA4FNRTEFXCJ6FRQBZLM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-tourists-flock-southeast-asia-overseas-travel-bounces-back-2024-02-20/Sophie Yu, Anne Marie Roantree世界中国
Top watchdogs tell China's finance sector to follow Communist Party valuesChina's top financial watchdogs vowed to keep up a campaign to ensure that the sector adheres to Communist Party values and serves the economy while avoiding "excessive" and "reckless" risks, the party's official newspaper said on Tuesday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 06:36:46 GMT PWV3KREESJPBDA4ZVDUELNV55I https://www.reuters.com/world/china/top-watchdogs-tell-chinas-finance-sector-follow-communist-party-values-2024-02-20/Joe Cash可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
US asset managers ready for China recovery with products stacked upThree straight years of losses from Chinese markets and anti-Beijing rhetoric from Washington have not deterred some U.S. asset managers from introducing products they hope will thrive if Chinese stocks rebound. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 06:08:30 GMT CWY5K2CNSFIONI4NAQC4EYK4TI https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-asset-managers-ready-turn-china-sentiment-with-products-stacked-up-2024-02-20/Suzanne McGee, Megan Davies市场ETF
Taiwan drives away Chinese coast guard boat as frontline island tensions riseTaiwan on Tuesday drove away a Chinese coast guard boat that entered waters near its sensitive frontline islands, in a rise in tensions a day after China's coast guard boarded a Taiwanese tourist boat that a Taiwan minister said has triggered "panic". Tue, 20 Feb 2024 02:21:50 GMT 4KHIFI5JU5NBNP5X7IMH5GNT44 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-minister-says-china-coast-guard-triggers-panic-by-boarding-taiwan-tourist-2024-02-20/Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
